      Methods in features with parameters of type ClientObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InvoiceObject Invoice.addInvoice(ClientObject clientObject, java.lang.String dueDate, java.lang.String feeBearer, Item item)
      Add a new invoice of the supplied item for the specified client.
      The format of the dueDate is MM/DD/YYYY.
      The feeBearer should either be FeeBearer.ACCOUNT or FeeBearer.
